CpsSidebarMenuComponent.description: CpsSidebarMenuComponent is a vertical menu panel component displayed at the edge of the screen.

props.description: Defines the input properties of the component.

values.name: isExpanded
values.description: Indicates current expansion state of the sidebar.

values.name: exactRoutes
values.description: Determines whether the menu items should allow activating only exact links.

values.name: height
values.description: Height of the sidebar, of type number denoting pixels or string.

types.description: Defines the custom types used by the module.

values.name: CpsSidebarMenuItem
values.description: CpsSidebarMenuItem is used to define the items of the CpsSidebarMenuComponent.
